projects.title: K-Nearest Neighbors on FPGA
projects.description: Implemented KNN algorithm on FPGA using VHDL.

projects.title: Extractive Text Summarizer From Scratch
projects.description: An Extractive Text Summarization algorithm implemented from scratch using NLP techniques. News articles are summarized by extracting key sentences that represent the main points of the text.

projects.title: MCQ Generation Algorithm From Scratch
projects.description: Developed an algorithm from scratch to automatically generate multiple-choice questions from text utilizing different techniques like TF-IDF to find similarity and extract important information.

projects.title: Interactive Linear Regression Android Application - Kotlin
projects.description: Developed a Kotlin-based ML app that allows users to input custom data points and generates a real-time linear regression model with interactive graph plotting. Designed for educational use and quick ML experimentation with a clean, responsive UI.

projects.title: LeafyLenz - Plant Care Guide App
projects.description: LeafyLenz is a Flutter-based mobile app that identifies rare plants using a custom image classification model and provides LLM-powered care tips. It features Firebase backend, Gemini 1.5 Flash for recommendations, push notifications, and AdMob monetization.

projects.title: LangGraph Agentic RAG Worfkflow
projects.description: Developed a simple Agentic RAG application using LangGraph with Web-search capabilities using Tavili API

projects.title: Document Sorter Using BERTopic
projects.description: developed a document sorting application using BERTopic to automatically organize research papers into meaningful categories based on abstracts.

projects.title: IoT Based HVAC System
projects.description: Developed a real-time temperature regulation system using ESP32, DHT22, and a custom PID controller to control fan and heater via PWM, with Arduino Cloud integration for live setpoint adjustment and remote monitoring.

projects.title: Environmental Monitoring System
projects.description: Built an IoT-based environmental monitoring system with ESP32 (ESP-IDF), DHT22, and MQ135 to track temperature, humidity, and air quality in real time, featuring OLED display and MQTT-based mobile integration.
